meanings.definition: A person or company that sells goods for retail.
meanings.sent1: The merchandisers at the store help customers find what they need.
meanings.sent2: The merchandisers stocked the shelves with new products.
meanings.sent3: The merchandisers decided to have a sale on all the hats.
meanings.sent4: The merchandisers were like busy bees, buzzing around the store.
meanings.sent5: The merchandisers greeted each customer with a smile, making shopping a pleasant experience.

meanings.definition: A device or display used to promote the sale of goods.
meanings.sent1: The merchandisers in the window showcased the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent2: The electronic merchandisers played videos of the new product features.
meanings.sent3: The merchandisers were strategically placed to catch the eye of passing shoppers.
meanings.sent4: The colorful merchandisers transformed the store into a vibrant space.
meanings.sent5: The interactive merchandisers engaged customers and encouraged them to make a purchase.
